One of the two girls on the ground now has a pair of hairy legs where her arms should be and the upper body of the other girl underneath her waist. The pair of female arms are joined together on the pavement. You swap the lifeless disembodies female arms out for those of the unaffected boy. He now has female arms instead of his normal male arms but is otherwise unaffected. You decide that he needs a bit more so you swap his chest out for the bustier of the two girls. You also give the four legged boy the chest of the other girl.

You swap the towering four legged boy's male arms out for the skinny girl's female arms. Now the skinny girl has masculine arms and the formerly curvy girl has masculine legs where her arms should be and they are both flat chested. You find a small girl who was at the museum with her mother. You give her the extra male arms on the ground so that she now has her normal arms with the larger arms of a teenage boy underneath them.

You watch as the girls struggle to roll over, each of their efforts counteracting those of the other. The boy with all the extra legs wobbles back and forth as he tries to control his extra limbs. The other boy is the least affected with nothing more than female arms and breasts.

You hear several sirens in the distance. Someone has called the authorities.
1113221211121111222211.title: Leave them and get back to swapping

choices: Wander around the surrounding area and get more people
11132212111211112222112.content:
You briefly consider leaving but the thought of swapping the authorities when they arrive is too much. You decide to pass the time waiting for them with some more swaps. You find a nice step to sit on. You absently cross your legs and pull your skirt down. Nobody seems to be paying you much attention at all. You scan the crowd for some more people who are unaffected.

You see one of the girls from the field trip still hanging around. You swap her body from the waist down with large burly man. He stumbles as his new scrawny legs struggle to hold up his bulk. The girl shrieks as she notices the change.

A female jogger with a small dog on a leash is standing near the sidelines. You swap her head with her dog's head. The dog, with the woman's body now, starts barking and running around wildly.

You see two business women walking by in the business suits. You swap one of the woman's head with the other woman's hand. You then swap the woman's other hand with the headless body. When you are done, there are two matching female hands on the ground, joined at the wrists. One woman has an entire female body on her left arm, joined at the neck and wrist, and a female head on the end of her right arm where her hand should be. You wonder who controls what as you see them struggle with each other.

Just then a fire truck pulled up along with a police car. Several firemen jump out of the truck and you get to work. You swap one fireman's head with that of a nearby boy. The boy looked like he was only about five or so. The fireman now has a four year old's body and looks around in confusion.

You swap another fireman's arms with his own legs. He now has his arms where his legs should be and vice versa.

You get a bit more creative with the third fireman. You swap his body away for one of the female hands on the ground so that he is just a head with a hand under his neck. You then swap his original legs back with the hand that he briefly had under his head. When you are done, he is nothing but a head atop his original legs and hips. You then decide to help him out just a bit. You swap his ears away for the business woman's hands. He now has two hands where his ears should be. His upper torso, from the wast to the neck, is on the ground with an ear at the top and bottom.

A police man and his female partner gets out the patrol car. You swap the policeman's legs from the waist down, including his gun, with everything but one of the ear's of the fireman that is laying on the ground. The policeman now has the upper torso of the fireman, joined at both of their waists, where his hips and legs should be, and terminating with an ear still on the fireman's neck.

The female officer is completely startled and draws her gun. She looks around frantically but doesn't see you sitting on the steps. Even if she did, she'd have no reason to suspect you. Plenty of other people who had been swapped had just given up and plopped down somewhere. You get to work to neutralize her. You swap her right hand, the one gripping the gun the most, with the remaining ear atop her partner's legs. She now has nothing but an ear at the end of her arm. The gun and her hand are now atop her partner's legs and hips. You swap her entire left arm with her own nose. You then swap her own right leg with her tongue. You swap her left leg with her head.

When you are done she is rather scrambled and falls over in a writhing mass of mixed up limbs and body parts. Her head is where her left leg should be with another leg impossibly protruding out of her mouth and an arm for a nose. Her tongue is where her right leg should be and is barely visible. On her left shoulder is nothing but a nose. Her right arm is mostly in tact but has an ear where her hand should be. You chuckle a bit with this one.

You pass several more minutes swapping everyone in sight that appears to be unscathed. Most of these are pretty simple head swaps. You try to swap men for women, adults for children, and heavy and thin as much as possible. After all, you don't want people winding up with bodies that are so close to their own that it isn't a big deal.

Soon a news crew arrives and starts setting up. A pretty anchor woman gets out of a van and stands in front of the scene. By now traffic has stopped and a gnarled mess of cars is blocking the street. The cameraman gets out and points the camera at the pretty anchorwoman. She is wearing a suit skirt. You decide to swap her head with the camera man's head. It is a little less exotic than what you did with the authorities, but it does the job.

Interestingly enough, she pushes the cameraman, or camerawoman now, to continue working. She gets in front of the camera with his body and proceeds to report on the crazy events. She even poses for the camera with her obviously male body.

"That is some dedication," you muse.

By now it is complete chaos. Most people are swapped in some way. Some of them are screaming, or fighting, others have just sat down.
11132212111211112222112.title: Mess with the authorities when they get here

111322121112111122221122.content:
By now you have completely lost count of how many people you have swapped around. This area is pretty much exhausted. Most of the people who haven't been affected have wised up and left by now. Though you doubt that too many got away. Only those who were smart and bolted early would have made it.

You casually get up and dust off your skirt before continuing on your way. You walk down the street away from the mess. You are not the only swapped person walking away from the scene. Several other victims of your frenzy are walking along with you. You are by far the most calm however. Due to this nobody says too much to you.

Traffic is a mess. You see all of the stopped cars lining the street. Many people are honking wildly. Several stare at you and your fellow mismatched pedestrians. You frantically swap around people that you see.

A man in a car who is staring gets swapped with a woman in another car. This time it is a full body swap and not just parts. You haven't tried this yet but judge from their reactions that it worked. You swap dozens more pedestrians and people in cars around this way as you walk.

You decide to go back to some crazy swaps though as it is more visually interesting.

You walk past a restaurant. A pretty young waitress is taking the order of a woman and her daughter. You swap the waitresses arms with the heads of her customers. The woman's body has one of the waitresses arms on top while her daughter's body has the other. The waitress now has three heads. Her's on her neck and her customers heads where her arms should be. You then pick two more customers at another table and swap their heads with her legs.

You keep walking. A large man with a beer belly walks by. He is holding the hand of a large obese woman. You switch around their upper torso's leaving their own arms and legs in place. They don't even seem to notice too much.

A woman runs past you. You swap her right hand for her own head. She stumbles with the disorientation that this causes.

You come to an intersection. There is a large sky-rise hotel at this corner and a bus stop along the intersecting street that isn't jammed up.
111322121112111122221122.title: Wander around the surrounding area and get more...

1113221211121111222211221.content:
You decide to get off of the street. Nobody has really bothered you up until now. You are obviously a bit messed up but you have kept everyone busy with their own swaps and there were other people on the street. Now there are less people who are swapped so Ashley's tight little female body is more noticeable under your male head. It is also starting to get late.

As soon as you enter the lobby several people turn their attention to you. You try to ignore their staring. You briefly consider swapping them around but you fear they might suspect you by association. Up until now you have almost completely managed to avoid suspicion, and even that was allayed by your taking Ashley's body. Now her body was a bit of a liability but no time to worry about that now.

You make your way to the back of the lobby and continue on. Lots of people stare at you but they politely keep their mouths shut. This is a nice place and these people are relatively classy.

As you wander around back you see a coat check area right before a ballroom. It looks like some sort of event is happening right now. Even though it is summer the night air is a bit cool. There is a coat or two back there. The hotel employee takes one look at you and she says, "Can I help you miss ... ter?"

Your mismatched body is becoming a problem. It is making it a bit hard to blend in. You look around nervously for anyone else. Then you swap her tongue with her right foot. You swap her left arm with her left leg. She is now writhing on the floor unable to speak.

"You've put your foot in your mouth now," you quip, thinking yourself clever for coming up with it. You hop the counter and find a coat that will mostly cover your body. You are in luck. Even though it isn't quite the right season, you find a men's dress trench coat hanging in the back. You quickly put it on and clasp the belt. It will mostly do. It covers your petite female body quite well. Your shoes are still visible but not much. If someone stared at your feet while you walked, they would see your female dress shoes and perhaps even your black pantyhose, but otherwise you'd probably be OK.

Just then you realize you have left a witness. Even though she can't talk, she can still communicate that you did this to her. You walk around the corner toward the ballroom and see a big plate glass window. You are in luck however. A man is walking a dog outside past the plate glass window. You switch the woman in the coat check area with the dog. You know it worked since the dog jumps up on the window and starts barking uncontrollably. The man struggles to control the dog and gets bitten for his trouble. You laugh as you watch the dog try to get in.

You wonder what to do next. You could go back outside, carefully avoiding the dog, now that you are less visible. On the other hand, you could crash the event.
1113221211121111222211221.title: Go into the hotel

11132212111211112222112211.content:
Even though you have an angry dog after you, you decide that the allure of crashing a fancy event is just too much.

You carefully peer around the corner. There are two men in tuxedos standing by the door. A man and a woman dressed in a formal gown walk up to them and hand them what must be an invitation of some kind. You don't think they've noticed you yet. You swap woman's right leg with one of the doormen's heads.

The doorman now has a womans leg with a garter and white stockings protruding from his neck. He falls over lifelessly with nothing to control his body.

"What the hell?" you hear the man exclaim from under the woman's gown. She shrieks as she falls over. You then swap the other doorman's head with her right arm. You then swap her left arm with her date's head.

Do you enter now that the door is clear? Or duck out now?
11132212111211112222112211.title: Crash the event

111322121112111122221122111.content:
The prospect of getting all of the people inside is just too tempting. You tentatively start to approach the doorway. Before you get there you hear a commotion.

"Oh my god!" A man exclaims. You can't see him since he is inside the door.

You see a group of people make a run for it. They jump over the convoluted mass of writhing doormen and mixed up guests and run for the outer door.

"Oh no you don't," you say to yourself. You target a woman who is wearing a red formal backless gown. You switch her right leg with the left arm of a nearby man. He has a stunning leg where his left arm should be. They both scream uncontrollably. She falls over now that she has one leg and one arm. You aren't done yet. You then switch the rest of her body for his right arm. When you are done, the mans two arms are joined together on the floor. The man has the woman's right leg where his left arm should be. Where his right arm should be he is connected to the woman's hip where her right leg should be. She is facing backward from the mans perspective and flopped down toward the ground since she can't really stand.

You target another man. You take his two legs and give him the two extra arms instead. You chain your way through about a dozen more people this way. You alternate between arms and legs. When you are done, everyone has either four arms, or four legs, the extra set having come from the person behind them in the chain.

You are left with a pair of female legs from the last woman who just got the extra arms. You target a man who is now running away. You swap his ears out with the woman's legs. Now he has two shapely legs sticking out of the side of his head. There are two ears on the ground.

It takes every ounce of restraint that you have to refrain from bursting out laughing. You don't want to draw attention to yourself. People are much too busy to pay you much attention.
111322121112111122221122111.title: Enter

1113221211121111222211221111.content:
You decide that it is time to get going. You slip out of the main door among all of the commotion. Nobody seems to have noticed you. You begin to walk down the sidewalk. Your trench-coat covers Ashley's body well enough that nobody really notices you.

You are suddenly struck with a few horrible thoughts. First of all, you were supposed to be watching Jessica. You just walked out on her to have this little adventure. Then you wonder how your parents will react to Ashley's body underneath your head. Surely they would notice that.

You take out your phone and look at it. You have almost a dozen missed calls from your mother. There are almost as many voice messages. Several text messages are also there. You read through a few but don't pay them much heed.

You go to a nearby bus stop. You have wandered far enough that it would be quicker to take the bus back. There are a few people here at the bus stop. You briefly entertain the idea of switching them around but decide you don't want to risk the attention.

Soon your bus comes and you hop on and find a seat. There are even more people on the bus. You again dismiss the idea of switching them around. You don't want the bus to stop and crowds to gather right now, perhaps another time.

As the bus is driving along, you notice quite a few people walking outside next to the bus. You can't resist that. The bus is waiting at a traffic light.

You see two young couples walking together. You swap each of the man's heads with his girlfriends right hand. Then you swap the women's heads with their boyfriends right hands. When you are done, each of their heads is where their date's right hand should be and their own right hand is on their new body's neck.

"Oh my god!" a woman on the bus exclaims. "Did you see that?" many people gasp and rush to your side of the bus to gawk. You then arrive at your bus stop. You decide to give them more of a show. You swap all of their heads around as you and a few other people exit the bus.

You don't even look back and walk to your house. It isn't a long walk but you are extremely hot from your out of season coat. Soon you wander to your front door and walk in.

"Andrew!" your mom exclaims, "Are you OK?" she frantically asks with genuine concern.

"Yeah mom," you reply.

"Where on earth have you been?" She asks as her expression changes from one of relief to one of anger. "You were supposed to be watching Jessica!" she snaps
1113221211121111222211221111.title: It is late, go home

Pretend you have no idea what is going on
11132212111211112222112211111.content:
"I had to come home early when Amanda called me," she frowned. "You've been gone all day."

Almost as if on cue, Amanda walked in. She had a smirk on her face. It was like she couldn't wait for you to get into trouble. She had no doubt exaggerated everything.

"What are you wearing," she says in her usual condescending tone. "It isn't winter."

You have had enough of your mother and older sister. You have been swapping people's bodies around all day to get what you wanted, why stop now?

You carefully consider what to do to them. You want something that will immobilize them and give you the control you need. You see Jessica playing in the kitchen. You briefly consider giving your mom the body of a six year old but decide against that for now. Instead you opt for a more exotic general scrambling.

You start with your mother. You swap her head and her right foot. Then you swap her left leg at the thigh with her right hand. She falls over. "Oh my god!" She shrieks. "What is going on?" Amanda starts freaking out too.

You then turn your attention to her. You decide to get a bit more creative here. Up until now you have focused primarily on limbs. You start with her face rather than her whole head. You swap her face with the skin on her stomach. Son there is a belly button complete with naval piercing where her face should be. You can hear her muffled screams from under her shirt. Next you swap her liver with her right hand. You wonder if that will work. Your question is answered when her right arm as a squishy reddish mass on the end of it. You conclude that her hand must be inside her body now.

You continue with her. You swap her arms and legs with each other so she can't stand. Next you swap her butt with her chest. She is now a writhing mass of mismatched limbs and visible internal organs.

"What is going on?" your mother shrieks. "I can't stand up."

"What is wrong with me?" Amanda cries. Your mother and Amanda both alternate between crying, yelling, and shrieking. Neither of them can stand up at all since their bodies are so mixed up.

You casually take off your dress coat and drape it over a chair. Amanda and your mother are way to busy to notice you. You still have Ashley's body in her school uniform under your head. Amanda has figured out how to lift her shirt so that her face is poking out from her stomach. It was hard to do with one hand, or one hand and a liver. Especially since her arms aren't where she would expect.

Just then Mark comes in. He must have heard all the noise. He stares at you, your mother, and Amanda. You decide that you are going to include him as well. You see Mack, the pet turtle. You swap Mark's head with Mack's head.

"Hey, what the hell ..." Mark shouts from inside Mack's cage. Mark's head has shrunk so that it can fit Mack's small body. Mark's body has Macks giant turtle head on it. Mack is wandering about on hands and knees in Mark's body.
11132212111211112222112211111.title: Show her who is boss

111322121112111122221122111111.content:
You stand up in front of everybody so that they can see you.

"What is going on honey," you mother almost pleads from her place on the ground.

"Why the hell are you a chick?" Mark asks from the turtle cage before you can answer your mother.

You turn to him, "Why the hell are you a turtle?"

"See, I told you he was up to no good," Amanda sobs. "I know he did this!"

"Shut up!" you snap at her.

Your mother replies, "We don't know what is going on."

There is lots of commotion and yelling and crying. You decide that you'll come back when they have settled down. You go upstairs to your room. You are extremely tempted to strip off Ashley's clothes and get a better look but you decide not to for now. Instead you pick up a comic book. As you are reading it you can't help but think that it is like you have a superpower too.

"Swapman," you say to yourself tentatively. "Can neutralize super villains with a single thought, no too corny."

As you think about this, you realize that you are certainly more like the super villains rather than the super heroes. With that you hop up from your perch and go back downstairs. You see Mack nosing through some of the cupboards. His massive turtle head is tearing into a box of cereal. You enter the room with your mother and two scrambled siblings. Jessica is in there now too. She is the only one in your family unaffected, including yourself. She is helping Amanda get a drink of water.

"What happened to you?" your mother asks as she sees your mismatched body.

"I know he had something to do with this," Amanda snarls.

You consider what to do for a moment.Finally you decide that you have already gotten bored with just swapping people around. Now you want to lord it over people.

"Yes Amanda, you are correct," you start. "I did this."

Everyone, including Jessica, gasps. "Change us back this instant," your mother demands.

"No!" you reply.

"No? How dare you!" your mother starts.

"Sorry, not happening," you say. "I'll do it when I feel like it, if ever. Every time you ask, I'll just resolve to leave you that way even longer."

With that you leave the room. As you walk upstairs you think about everything. You are starting to understand the absolute power that you now wield. Sure you knew that you could use this to get away, or to cause trouble before, but now you realize that you could have absolute control over nearly anyone. You take your time as you avoid your family. You read some comic books again. Finally you realize that you are hungry. You go into the kitchen and find some food that Mack hasn't gotten into yet. After a quick snack you venture back into the living room.

"Please," Amanda begs you. It is sincere and quite strong.
111322121112111122221122111111.title: Admit to everything and use this to get what yo...

choices: She still tries to maintain control
1113221211121111222211221111111.content:
"I'll tell you what," you start, "You do anything I say, and I'll fix you up, at least enough that you aren't helpless." You then look right at your mother, "That goes for all of you."

"Yes, I'll do anything." Amanda begs.

"Me too," Mark agrees.

Your mother stares at you defiantly. It is as if she is trying to be the authority figure here. "She'll come around," you think to yourself.

You start to restore Amanda. You swap her liver and hand back. You restore her face to it's proper location. You restore her arms and legs, finally her breasts and butt cheeks are restored.

"Thank you!" She squeals as she jumps up and down and hugs herself.

"Not so fast," you say. You then swap Mark's head onto Amanda's body.

"Hey," Amanda yells from the turtle cage. "This isn't any better."

"I don't want to be a chick," Mark complains.

"Would you rather be a turtle?" you ask as you stare your 'brother' down. He nervously shakes his head no and takes a step back. You then swap Mack's head with Amanda's. This leaves a fully restored turtle and your brother and your sister with each others bodies.

"Now, if you do what I say, I may fix you further. Disobey, and you'll wish you hadn't." you chide them. "Now go!" you demand as you point upstairs. They scurry off.

You now glare at your mother. You dare her to disagree.
1113221211121111222211221111111.title: Perhaps a little bit

Take Amanda's head for yourself so you aren't mismatched.
11132212111211112222112211111111.content:
"Honey, please," she begs. "We don't need to do this. Just put us all back to normal and we'll forget this," she suggests.

"Sorry, too late for that," you say. "If you agree to do what I say, I'll put you back together enough that you can get up and walk around."

"Andrew, please," she begs. She starts to cry a bit. You turn around and start to walk away. "I'll be back when you change your mind," you say.

"Wait!" she calls out.

You turn around and face her. "This is how this works," you start. "I tell you to do something, you do it. If not, I'll screw you up again."

Tears are now streaming from her eyes. She nods her agreement. You start restoring her body parts to their proper place. You stop at her head. You need some leverage on her somehow. You decide that you can't fully restore her without something hanging over her. The point here is mainly to appease her and get her functional enough to help you out.

"Are you going to fix mommy yet?" Jessica asks as she walks into the room. "yes," you say as you look at her. You quickly swap your mother's head back into place. Then you swap Jessica's head with your mother's.

"I'm tall now," Jessica says with a mixture of fear and a bit of excitement.

You mother starts to say something about this turn of events but you put your finger to your mouth and cut her off. "You don't want to go back, do you?" you warn her. She nods her head no.

"I want a beer and some snacks," you demand as you go sit down on the couch and put your feet up.

She sighs and goes into the kitchen. "Jessica, can you help me reach something?" you hear your mother whisper from the other room. You pick up the remote and start flicking through the channels. Your mother returns with your beer and thrusts it into your hand. You can tell she isn't happy about it at all. She then stomps off. It is quite comical with her short six year old body. She comes back and throws a plate of pizza rolls on the coffee table.

You are enjoying your beer and pizza rolls. It is even nicer since you don't have to hide it from your mother, she gave it to you. "ah, this is the life," you say out loud.

When you are done you put your feet back on the coffee table and sit back with your beer. You can't help but notice your legs. You are still wearing black pantyhose and women's dress shoes. You wonder if you should fix your mismatched body. It has served it's purpose after all.

You go through your options. The obvious solution is to take Mark's body. However, Amanda has it right now. You don't want to give her Ashley's body as it removes your leverage on her. She might just be OK with Ashely's body, even though it isn't as good as her own, and run off or something. That doesn't seem like a good idea.

The other option would be to take Amanda's head so that you are no longer mismatched. Then you'd look like your sister but with Ashley's body instead.

Or you could just hold off and look for something else later.
11132212111211112222112211111111.title: She agrees

choices: Take Amanda's body from Mark so that you are wearing more casual cloths.
111322121112111122221122111111112.content:
You see your mother walk by. She is headed upstairs. The fact that she is mumbling profanities doesn't escape you.

"Mother," you start, "fetch Amanda for me. I need her for something."

She nods her head and you hear her mutter more profanities. For the time being it appears that she'll cooperate.

You are still a bit undecided as to what you are going to do here. On the one hand you really would prefer Mark's body. Being a chick isn't really so bad, but it isn't what you are used to. Mark works out and has a nice muscular body. To be frank, it is an improvement over your old one that Ashley still has. On the other hand you really don't want to lose this leverage over your new servants.

"What do you want?" your sister says in an irritated tone.

"For starters, you need to treat me with respect." You say.

You think about your pet snake, Jerin. You swap Amanda's lower half from the waist down with part of Jerin's body. Now Amanda has Mark's upper torso below her head and a large Snake tail from the waist down. She flops to the floor.

"What was that for?" She sobs.

"You agreed to do what I say, or suffer the consequences," you say. "from now on, you are to always be nice and polite and call me sir."

"but ..."

"but nothing," you cut her off. "You can have Mark's legs back in an hour once you have learned this lesson."

You watch as she tries to move around. She flops around with her snake body.

"Now," you say. "I brought you here for another reason."

She looks up at you with pleading in her eyes. You do not relent. You decide that you will restore her in an hour as you said.

"I brought you here because I have a mismatched body. It has caused me a bit of trouble since I acquired it."

"Yeah, I have been meaning to ask about that." she says as she calms down a bit.

"Suffice it to say, I acquired this body to allay suspicion that I was causing the mass public body part swapping," you say.

She has a look of shock on her face.

"Now, it has served it's purpose," you continue. You decide to rub her disobedience in her face a bit more. "I was going to take Mark's body and give you Ashley's body," you sneer.

"But your insolence proves that you aren't quire ready for that kind of reward. Besides, Mark's body is now half snake."

She cries now, "I'll be good, I promise. I'll take that body off of your hands."

"However, for now I am not going to give you the female body that you want. But, I still have my little problem of being mismatched that prevents me from going out in public. Instead I'll take your head and face."

"No ..." she cries.

"Stop!" you demand. "If you are good, I'll reward you by giving you Ashley's body and your head back. If you are bad, I'll become male again by giving your head and face and very identity away to some guy."

"I'll be good, I promise," she sobs. "I'll do anything you say, honest."

"You will call me sir, and never be rude on irritated, got it?"

"I'll be good sir," she corrects herself and cries on the floor. You smile at how well that worked. You then take Ashley's head. When you are done you look at your sister. She is now no longer a girl in any way. She has your head atop your brothers torso with a giant snake's tail for her lower body.

You walk away and go to the bathroom. You look in the mirror to see Amanda's pretty face where your own should be. You now look like any other girl. Nothing is out of place in the slightest. The only thing that is at all irritating is the fact that you are wearing a skirt and pantyhose. You think that it makes your body look stunning, but it isn't what you want to wear.
111322121112111122221122111111112.title: Take Amanda's head for yourself so you aren...

1113221211121111222211221111111121.content:
You think about it a bit more and decide that it would be more convenient in every way to have Amanda's body instead of Ashley's. Amanda was wearing jeans today so you would no longer be wearing a skirt. Beyond that she had a closet full of things if you needed something different.

"Mark," you yell so that your brother can hear you. You are surprised to hear Amanda's voice instead of your own. You should have expected it but it caught you off guard.

He comes in with his eyes darting around nervously. "Quiet, he'll hear you," he says. "I don't want him to know we are talking."

You decide to play along, "Look, Andrew gave me that girl's body," you announce with glee. "He wanted your male body for himself."

He snarled, "Who does he think he is? He can't do this to us. We should do something."

"No!" you assert. "You will do nothing."

You then swap his head back onto mack like before. Mack's head is on Amanda's body and gets down on his hands and knees. He starts crawling around with Amanda's body.

You take off your purse that has your phone and other personal items in it. You set it down on the ground and will the swap to occur. You swap your own head with Mack's head. Soon Mack's giant turtle head is on Ashley's body instead of your own.

You now have Amanda's body. You enjoy the height difference and are glad to be out of that skirt and pantyhose. One difference that you weren't counting on is that Amanda is bigger up top that Ashley was. This change is much more noticeable..

You decide that the tradeoff in height and clothing is worth it and ignore it. Mack now flops down on all fours again. You enjoy seeing up Ashley's skirt a bit. You give Mack a quick slap on the behind before picking up your things and going back downstairs. You go and find Mark in Mack's cage.

"Mark," you say as you approach. "Glad I found you, I need to have a chat with you."

Mark's tiny head is on Mack's little turtle body. "It would appear that you don't understand what being my servant means," you say. "I expect you to be polite to me at all times. You are to call me sir, even though I stole Amanda's body, and not do anything against me."

"Andrew?" Mark asks. "I ... I'm sorry."

"I know," you reply. "Perhaps I'll fix you up later. For now you can spend the night as a turtle. If I find out you have told anyone or done anything against me, I'll never fix you up."

He nods his understanding. Then he does something you've never seen your older brother do. He cries. Satisfied that he'll be cooperative in the future, you walk away.

You walk to the kitchen. You have to step over Amanda as you do.

"Amanda, thanks for letting me have your body too," you say. "Since I can't have Mark's body, yours is preferable to Ashely's since you weren't wearing a skirt."

"But ..." 

"But what?" you challenge her.

"But nothing sir," she says.

"Oh, by the way," you add. "Mark thought I was you. I got the impression that you two were plotting against me."

"No ... we weren't," she starts.

"Well, you get to spend the night like that. I'll put you in a better state tomorrow." you add.

"Please ... I swear, I didn't do anything," she begs.

"Nope, not yet, the hour isn't up yet," you say. "However, if you promise that you won't plot against me again, I'll give you Ashley's body, but you have to keep my face."

"I promise," she says. "thank you thank you."

You decide that sometimes rewards might help ensure loyalty too. You resolve to keep them all on a short leash.

It is getting late. You wonder what you should do.
1113221211121111222211221111111121.title: Take Amanda's body from Mark so that you ar...

choices: There is a knock on the door
11132212111211112222112211111111211.content:
You decide that it is a bit late. There isn't really anything to do right now. You decide to go to bed and get some sleep.

You are struck with the thought that they might try to do something to you while you sleep. You aren't sure what that might be however. You think about that in the back of your mind.

It is time to fix up Amanda. You go over to her and find her on the floor where you last left her. You swap her snake tail back for Mark's legs. Then, as promised, you give her Ashley's body from the neck down.

"Thank you," she says in glee as she feels herself up. She is clearly glad to be female again even if it isn't her own body.

"Amanda," you say.

"Yes sir," she replies.

"Perfect," you think to yourself. "I want to go to bed. Since I am in your body I think it would be best to wear your pajamas. I am going to loan you your own body, you are to change into pajamas, then come right back."

"You mean it?" she asks with excitement. "My own body?"

"Just for enough time to change into your PJs," you reply.

You will the swap to occur. You are now right back on Ashley's body. The familiar yet annoying feeling of pantyhose and a skirt is now yours again.

"Get dressed, come right back," you warn.

She runs off with a smile.
11132212111211112222112211111111211.title: Go to bed.

choices: Let your mother take the fall
111322121112111122221122111111112111.content:
"Amanda," you say as she starts to run off. "Brush your teeth too." you add. You then switch your heads. You now have your own head again and Ashley's body, just like earlier. Amanda is now fully herself. "If you abuse this, you'll spend the night as the snake."

"Yes, I'll be good," she says as she runs upstairs.

You sit down on the couch and wait for Amanda to finish her tasks. You are enjoying the absolute obedience that you are currently getting.

** Knock ** Knock ** Knock

Someone is at the door. You wonder who would be here at this horrible hour. Your mother, with Jessica's body runs up to answer the door.

You are worried that whoever it is will see your mother's condition. You scurry to the door after her.

You arrive just in time to see your mother talking to two police officers. "He's right inside," she says to them.

You stare in horror at them both.

"There he is, hurry," your mother yells. Clearly the threat of leaving her with Jessica's body wasn't enough to dissuade her from anything like this.

"That is him," one of the officers says. They must have seen you. He rushes in to cuff you.
111322121112111122221122111111112111.title: There is a knock on the door

1113221211121111222211221111111121111.content:
You allow the officer to cuff you. He begins reading you your rights.

"You have the right to remain silent," he starts.

You look over at your mother. "I am sorry," she says. "I just knew that wouldn't ever stop. Better to be stuck like this, than stuck under you."

You understand now. She has betrayed you completely. " ... anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law."

You make a decision right there. You are no longer Andrew. Andrew is about to go to jail for a long time, assuming they can ever prove that anybody did this, let alone Andrew.

"Oh, I totally swapped everyone body parts around at the museum," you say. You mother looks at you. Her inner attorney kicks in.

"Andrew, quiet," she says.

"Then I went to a hotel," you continue. "I put the coat check lady in a dog after I scrambled her body. Anything involving body swapping or body part swapping was me. I did it all."

Then you switch your mind with your mothers right as they are hauling you off. You can faintly hear your old body protest. "Goodbye mom," you say to her as she is hauled away.

You turn around to see Amanda staring at you. She is in her pajamas and looks all ready for bed. Her mouth is hanging open and a few tears are streaming down her face.

"I am sorry," you start with your mother's voice. "I know you wanted Ashley's body," you sneer. You know that isn't why she is crying, but you pretend like that is why you think she is.

"Thank you for changing," you say as you swap yourself into Amanda's body. Amanda is now a mixture of your mother and your younger sister.

This has certainly taken a turn for the worst. What should you do now? The police may figure out that the person in custody isn't Andrew, or at least not capable of swapping body parts. Who knows who else may come after you.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111.title: Let your mother take the fall

choices: One more round, for old times sake
No, better to be discrete about things
11132212111211112222112211111111211112.content:
You decide it is time to leave. You probably have a while, but you want to get out of here in a hurry.

You restore Mark. Since Mack had his body he is now completely whole. Jessica has your mother's body under her head and Amanda has your Mother's head and Jessica's body.

You then decide Mark shouldn't be whole. You restore your mother's body and stick Amanda in there. Then you stick Jessica in Mark's fully restored body and Mark in Jessica's.

"Everyone, I am leaving now," you say. "I will come back at some point. If you haven't told anyone that I am not in jail, I'll restore you to your proper bodies, or as close as I can come," you say. That last part was for Amanda since you are still wearing her body and are planning on leaving.

With that you grab Amanda's car keys and head out the door. You get in Amanda's car and start driving. You aren't sure if what you said to them is true or not. You are also not sure where you are going. You want to distance yourself from the name Andrew as much as possible. You want to say goodbye to your girlfriend, Jenny, but you know she won't approve of what you have done in the slightest. Furthermore, that won't distance yourself from your old identity.

You can be anyone you want. Mainly you want to be someone completely unrelated. You are extremely tempted to cause another incident like at the museum. It was funny. Yet you are trying to be discrete. You do want everyone to think that your mother is really you. That wouldn't work if you start going crazy in public again.
11132212111211112222112211111111211112.title: Time to leave

choices: Enjoy being a bird a bit more
111322121112111122221122111111112111122.content:
As much as you want to, you decide that you'd better be discrete. Besides, it is late and there isn't that much that is open. For that matter, the late hour is going to make finding a new identity difficult. There aren't a lot of people out. You also think about how to jump into a new body without whoever is stuck in Amanda's body telling anyone.

Sure, you could switch bodies and kill Amanda's body, but you feel like that is going a bit too far. Though certainly some of the people that you have scrambled around today may wish that they were dead. Some people are so incapacitated that they may prefer death. Perhaps you could do it.

Another thought that you have is that you could switch into an animal first. Then, the animal in Amanda's body won't be able to tell anyone anything. That idea is sounding better and better to you. That is also preferable since it doesn't draw any attention to you and won't have the police looking for a murderer.

"Yes," you say, "an animal."

You've made up your mind. Now how to proceed. There aren't a lot of people or animals out tonight. Everyone is in their beds. Another consideration is that you don't want to leave Amanda's body or car anywhere near your new identity. You don't want there to be any perceivable link. You look around. It is late at night but perhaps there are some animals nearby. You see several birds perched nearby.

"Perfect," you say to yourself. You will the swap to occur and soon you are in the most foreign body you have ever been in.

Your vision is incredible. You can focus in on every detail or zoom out all at once. You are completely incapacitated with sensory overload for a minute. You move your arms around. They feel strong, yet limited in their movement. You don't have fingers that you can wiggle anymore, at least not as much. You still seem to have those muscles, but when you try to wiggle your fingers, not much happens. It is more like your arm shifts and twists a little bit.

You look down and are shocked to see the crest of the bird that you just possessed where your chest should be. You reach out to the sides with your 'arms' and take a look. You see to wings spread out to each side of you. You are excited and afraid at the same time. You want to fly but aren't sure how.

You think about all of your experiences to date. Other than the people that have been so scrambled, nobody has been tripping over themselves. Whatever magic or power you have been given seems to compensate for varying body configurations. You wonder if those people that were so scrambled could move about, they just are paralyzed with the preconceived notion that they can't. Perhaps that is something to experiment with later, but for now it stands to reason that whatever allowed you to walk in Ashley's body all day without falling over, would allow you to function with a bird's body.

You are perched on a small picnic table next to Amanda's running car. You conclude that the drop isn't too bad so you are going to go for it. You walk up to the ledge. You find that if you think about it too much, you fall over your legs since they are so unlike any legs you've ever had before. You don't know how to move them. However, if you relax and let your bird body do the walking, you can manage. Your body seems to know how to do it.

You relax and get used to letting your body do the thinking about how to move instead of you actively overriding your bodies natural rhythms. With Ashley and the other humans you've been today, you know how to move. Walking as Ashley and walking as yourself are so similar, that you didn't think about it or actively fight your bodies natural ability to walk. In this case you have to actively not think about it.

Soon you get the hang of it. Walking around the table is as natural as walking would be in your old body, or Amanda's, or Ashley's. Time to fly. You go to the edge and jump off. Your little bird heart is racing. Of course that is natural for a bird but you swear there is a bit of a rush as well. You let your body do its thing and take flight. In no time at all you are soaring above the ground.

Your eyesight is incredibly good. Even in the low light you can make out every detail below you. The colors seem a bit different to you. You reason that birds eyes are configured different and that this is how birds always see things. Soon you are completely caught up in flying. It is exhilarating. Nothing you have ever experienced before quite matches it. You fly around town for what feels like hours.

Soon you realize that you are incredibly hungry. Starving in fact. You feel almost weak. You look down at the ground. You are over a residential neighborhood right now.

"Oh man, I don't want to eat worms," you think to yourself. Soon you see a nice bird feeder in someones backyard. Almost without thinking, you swoop down and perch on the feeder. You are so hungry that you don't even think about what you are doing. The birdseed looks so good. You push your beak into the seed and start eating.

You frantically eat the seeds in the feeder. Your body knows how to crack the seeds open with your beak and eat the insides. In a frenzy of activity you are cracking seeds and gobbling them down. You soon feel thirsty. The also have a bird bath next to the bird feeder. You hesitate for only a moment before drinking the water there.

For quite some time you alternate between the two until your body feels satisfied. You still feel a bit weak but are feeling much better. You also feel tired. Not as much as you would have thought given that it was now the middle of the night, but tired. You find a nice branch in a nearby tree and perch there. Soon you are lightly sleeping like a bird sleeps. You are vaguely aware of your surroundings, enough that you know you are safe.

You get up several times to feed in the bird feeder and drink the water. You even go for a few night flights but come back here after each one. You don't want to get too far away from the abundance that can be found here. Soon, morning comes.
111322121112111122221122111111112111122.title: No, better to be discrete about things

choices: Get a feel for this family as Cheyenne
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
As you are dozing a bit, someone opens the door to the house. You don't really see who it is but you do see a dog running out into the back yard. It is a fairly big dog. The dog barks at you in the tree. You know that the dog can't reach you up here so you don't fly away. The dog is jumping up and trying to get you. You are getting quite annoyed.

"Hmm," you think, "perhaps I'll give being a dog a try."

You will the swap to occur. Soon you are in the body of the dog now. You are again bombarded with tons of strange sensations. Your vision again looks very different. You notice that you don't see as much red or green. However blues seem to be much stronger. You are aware that your hearing and smell are much more acute than normal. You struggle to understand the new senses that you posses.

You hear a woman yelling, "Come on Cheyenne, do your business."

You realize that she is talking to you. You also realize that you do feel a familiar feeling. You have to pee. You go over to the tree that you were perched in as a bird. You see a bird writhing on the ground and realize that the dog hasn't been as successful at figuring being a bird out as you were. You squat down and pee. Your body seems to know what to do. Apparently you are a female dog.

When you are done you trot back inside. You look up to see a teenage girl, not a woman. She looks like she is about fifteen, about the same age as you. She is pretty and is dressed in some short denim shorts and a tee shirt. Her belly is slightly exposed and is nice and flat.

"Honey," you hear another woman say. You look up to see her. "Is Cheyenne taken care of?" She asks. She is about thirty five or so. Her age is apparent in her face, but she has aged well. Her body is slender and trim. She is wearing skinny jeans and a silk top.

"Yes mom," the little girl says.

You decide that you are tired of being a dog. This little family will serve as your new home for now. You can always use the bird trick again to get away if things don't work out here. You wonder if there is a dad or a son too. It might be nice to be a guy again.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Time to be something else

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You really are done being a dog, but you decide to wait just a bit. You want to know who lives here and how many people you are dealing with. Being the dog seems like a good way to infiltrate the family and spy a bit.

You wander through the house to see what kind of family this is. You follow the young girl as she walks away. She goes up the stairs and you follow her. You enjoy watching her rear as you do.

She goes into a bedroom. You look inside as you walk past. You see her sitting on a bed. It appears to be the only bed in that room.. You look into the other bedrooms. There is a master bedroom. It appears that the woman sleeps alone in there. There is no sign of a man there. All of the clothes and items that you see are for a woman.

There is one other bedroom but it appears to be used as a home office instead of a bedroom. The woman is sitting in there on the phone. She appears to be working from home. You walk back downstairs. This level has nothing but a kitchen and a living room. You go downstairs to the basement.

It is actually pretty nice. There is a pool table and a media area. You decide that this will do. This is a nice place. It would be nice if there were a boy that lived here too, but why not?

You decide that it is time to be a person again, but which one?
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Get a feel for this family as Cheyenne

choices: Admit to her what is going on
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You walk back into the girl's bedroom. She is still sitting up there on her bed. She is talking on the phone. It sounds like she is talking to a friend. She pats the bed next to her. You go ahead and hop up next to her.

She absently scratches your ears as you sit there. You have to admit your yourself that it feels nice. You just sit there for a moment. Finally you are done waiting.

You will the swap to occur. Soon you are a person again. You almost don't mind that you are a girl again. You are getting used to it. Two arms, two legs, can't ask for more. You wiggle your fingers in delight. You are glad to be human again.

** woof ** woof

The dog is going crazy. She is rolling and writing around wildly. Finally she gets up and growls at you. For a moment you are scared.

"Settle down," you say to her. "Listen to me."

She stops growling but her teen are still borne.

You think through your options. You could pretend that you don't know what is going on and pretend to try to help her get back to normal. Alternatively you could try to control them much like you did with your family. The latter is certainly the more appealing option of the two, however it didn't exactly work out so well for you last time.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: The girl

choices: Take a turn in Danielle's body
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You decide that you will try again. You can always tell these people about the last person that tried to double cross you. You figure you'll work out the exact details of how to control them later. For now you need to get the ball rolling.

"Hello," you start. "You probably noticed that you are a dog and that I am in your body. In case you were wondering, I did that."

She snarls and growls at you.

"If you attack me, you'll hurt your own body," you point out. She immediately stops. It is a good thing too because it looked like she was about to tear you to shreds. You hear her whimper like dogs do.

"I am not your dog Cheyenne either. I became her earlier today," you continue. The girl continues whimpering.

"Do as I say, and I'll let you be human again. Disobey, and I'll leave you stuck as a dog. Nod if you understand."

The dog tentatively nods her head. "If you attack me, or try to turn me in, or hurt me in any way," you'll be stuck as a dog."

"Cheyenne!" you hear the woman snap. "Bad girl! I was on the phone."

The woman comes storming into the bedroom. She scolds the dog some more before turning her attention to you.

"Nichole, what on earth is going on in here?" she asks you with an irritated tone.

You then swap her into the dog, freeing Nichole from the four legged prison. Nichole frantically starts feeling herself. "I'm me again," she says out loud before she realizes something is wrong.

"No," you say, "you are your mother."

The mother starts barking wildly just like Nichole did when she was trapped there. The routine is almost the same. The mother barks, and cries and whimpers just like Nichole did.

"Mom," Nichole in her mothers body says as she runs up and hugs her mother with tears in here new eyes. "It's me, Nichole."

Nichole then explains to her mother everything that you had just told her. It was kind of nice to not have to explain it again yourself. She didn't leave out a single detail.

"I don't know what else to do," she adds at the end. "I think we just have to wait it out."

You step up and take a turn. "Ladies, You will do as I say and you'll each get some time as a human. You can even have a turn being yourself. However, if you cross me, one of you will wind up stuck as the dog forever. If you don't want that to happen, if you truly love each other, you'll comply."

You think about what your mother said as she turned you in. She had indicated that it would be better to be stuck as they were, than to live under your tyranny. With that though you add, "I'll eventually get bored and leave. I promise that if you are cooperative, I'll restore you both and go somewhere else."

You actually fully intend to do that if they fully cooperate.

"Please, don't hurt us," Nichole pleads.

"I won't," you say, "If you are good. What is your mother's name?" you ask Nichole.

"Danielle"

"Well Nichole and Danielle, do as I say, don't cross me, and I'll have you both restored and be on my way."

"When?" Nichole asks

"When I am bored with you," you reply.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Admit to her what is going on

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You decide that you want to talk to Danielle now. "Nichole, Danielle, I am going to switch you now so that I can talk to Danielle."

You swap them back.

"Why are you doing this?" Danielle, now in her own body, pleads with you.

"It doesn't matter," you say to her. You are annoyed that she wants a reason.

"Please ..." she pleads with you, "just leave us alone."

"I will, but later," you promise. "Right now I want you to tell me about you, how much money do you have? What is your situation?"

"You can have all of our money, please just take it and go."

You are getting annoyed with this. "Stop asking me to leave. I will leave when I am ready." you say.

You then swap Danielle's head with her foot so that she is unable to walk easily.

** woof ** woof **

Nichole barks wildly at you. You point to her with a stern finger, "stop it right now or I'll do the same to you. Even as a dog, things can be worse."

Nichole stops. "I'll restore you when I get back. You are to do as I say, when I say it. Don't ask me questions or attempt to change my mind or you'll be punished."

With that you walk out of the room and go downstairs. Nichole doesn't follow you. You suspect she is attending to her mother as best she can as a dog.

You root around on the kitchen counter and find some house keys. You leave the house and lock up the front door.

"Ah," you say as you take in the morning air. "freedom."

You think about what you want to do.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Go somewhere

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You briefly consider going to a mall or some other public place. However, you decide that would be too much temptation. For the time being you want to maintain a low profile. Perhaps when you are done with this little family you'll leave with a bang before going into hiding somewhere else.

You instead decide to just go for a little walk around this nice little neighborhood. It is a nice summer morning and you are enjoying the summer air. Several people say hi. Since some of them even use Nichole's name it is clear that she knows them. You suppress the urge you unleash your power on them. Instead you just enjoy the nice morning.

You can feel the sun on Nichole's exposed legs, stomach, and arms. It feels nice and warm. You enjoy every minute of it. As you walk along you take some time to understand how this power compensates for different body types. You find that when you don't think about walking and just do it, you have a feminine sway in your step. This is undoubtedly how Nichole would walk and what her body natural does. If you think about how to walk too much, and override her bodies natural rhythms, then your walking become more stiff. Much as you used to walk.

You finally settle into Nichole's natural gait. You walk around the block a few times and enjoy the sun on your exposed flesh. Part of you wishes you were currently male but you decide that it doesn't really matter much. You can be anyone at any time. There is something sensual about being a hot chick, at least since you know you can fix it anytime. For now you decide to just enjoy it as it is.

At length you decide to go back to the house. Danielle will probably stop asking you to leave now. You go to the front door and let yourself in.

"Nichole," you yell. Nichole, in the dog's body, come running down. You can tell she isn't happy (her tail isn't wagging) but she doesn't make any hostile moves toward you either. "OK, let's go fix up your mother," you offer.

You go upstairs and start to go to Nichole's room. Nichole goes down the hall and barks at you. You almost get mad at her but then you realize she is just trying to tell you something and can't really talk. It isn't a hostile bark. She is sitting outside her Mother's room instead. You figure that Nichole is just trying to lead you to Danielle.

You enter Danielle's room and find her lying on her bed. She looks at you with tears in her eyes. "I won't ask you to leave again, but please be as gentle as possible," she pleads. "Put me in the dog for now, let Nichole be a person."

You restore her head to its proper location. You decide to follow through with her request. You swap her and Nichole so that Nichole is in her mother's body and Danielle is now the dog. "There, I am not entirely unreasonable," you say sternly.

Nichole is crying now that she can once again. She looks like she is going to say something but wisely doesn't.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Just go for a walk

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You decide to let Nichole be herself and you'll take Danielle's body for a spin. She is hot, for an old lady. You will the swap to occur.

"I'm me again," Nichole exclaims with only a hint of happiness. "Mom?" she asks as she looks at you. You point to the dog and Danielle barks softly. "Oh" she says dejectedly.

"I thought you'd like to be yourself after being the dog," you offer. You don't want to be completely mean to them. That didn't work out so well with your family.

Just then the doorbell rings. Nichole has a worried look on her pretty young face. Danielle's eyes dart around nervously. "Who could that be?" you wonder. You all dart downstairs together. You motion for Nichole to stop where she is. You look through the peephole so that you can see. It is a young boy, about your age. "He must be here for Nichole," you think.

"It is a young boy," you say to Nichole. She takes a look for herself.

"It's my boyfriend, Chris," she says. You wonder if you should let him in or not. There are several options here. You are currently in the mother's body. You could answer the door and send him away as the big bad mom. Alternatively you could let him in and bring him into your little fold. It might be nice to have a male body you could take. You could also let him in and give Nichole strict instructions not to tell him.

Perhaps you'll let Nichole decide. If she tries to tell him, well then he is in and you know how loyal, or at least obedient, Nichole will be. Or you could just send him away.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Take a turn as Danielle

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
You decide to let this be a little test for Nichole to see what she'll do. You pull Nichole aside for a moment.

"Nichole," you start. She is looking into your eyes with that 'deer caught in headlights' look. "I am going to allow Chris in. If you tell him anything, or try anything, then he'll be included in this situation and I'll scramble you all up for a week. Alternatively you can just enjoy your time with him and pretend nothing is wrong. If that is the case then you can have this time with him, and there will be no consequences. Do you understand?"

She nods her head. "Now, don't cry or tell him anything. If he asks about your demeanor, just say you just found out a family member died."

You open the door, "Hi Chris," you say. You hope he can't tell that you aren't quite acting like Danielle.

"Hi Miss Thompson," he replies, "Is Nichole here?"

Nichole comes around the corner and give Chris a big hug. He wasn't quite expecting that. She is probably glad to see a friendly face you reason.

"You can come inside for an hour or so but Nichole can't go anywhere right now," you say, "We've got plans for later."

"Right," Nichole nervously says.
