You can feel your second back start to ache a bit from being hunched over like that. Your parts clearly aren't quite built to be in that position for long.

You ignore it however and trot around the locker room some more. You wonder how fast you can run, or if this would actually slow you down since your parts aren't quite made for this. You look at the cheerleaders moaning and writing on the floor. You decide that you are done with them and are ready to move on.

You unlock the door and run down the hallway. Your body works together and you find that with the extra legs that are working together so well, you can run at least as fast as a good runner. You realize that your back in particular isn't made for this which slows you down considerably. Nevertheless, it does provide at least some of the effect.

You run out onto the field again. The field is nearly empty. You see a few brave people trying to help some of the scrambled people get off of the field. There is a man who is currently helping the cheerleader who has her arms and legs switched. You smile wickedly as you swap her arms and legs back into place, fully restoring her.

They both look around in confusion. He helps her to their feet and they both begin running away. "Oh, you're not done yet," you exclaim as you lash out with your power again. You swap some of the skin on her right shoulder with his head. Now his head is on her shoulder and his body drops lifelessly to the ground. You see them struggle to walk as they fight for control of what is now their body.

You look around you. People are now leaving the stadium in droves. That vast majority of them are completely untouched since you got distracted. The stadium is only about half full now with the other half presumably having left for safety.

You run around the field with your horse-like cheerleader body. You cause as many swaps as you can with the people that you see. You start off with a man that is running up the stairs, you swap his face onto his left butt cheek. He stumbles to the ground with complete disorientation.

You next target a group of three teenage girls. You swap two of their heads onto the shoulders of the third girl, much like you did with that guy and the cheerleader a few minutes ago. There are now three brains vying for control of a single body. They all tumble down into a seat and scream in unison. Their movement is nothing but flailing and shaking due to so many conflicting commands. The other two bodies drop lifelessly to the ground with no heads.

You then target a man and a woman. You swap his face (and his mind) onto her stomach. His body drops lifelessly to the ground now that there is nobody to control it. They both drop to the ground together. The man can't see since the woman's shirt is covering his face but you can tell from the poor movement that they are fighting to control the same body.

You target another man and a woman. This time you swap the woman's face onto the man's stomach without her mind. She is now completely blind and unable to talk. She panics and starts feeling around helplessly, unable to see, or scream. The man looks down at his stomach in confusion. You watch as he pulls his shirt up to see her face on his belly. He waves his hand in front of his new face's eyes. He closes his own original eyes and seems confused that he can still see from his new eyes. You watch for just a moment in amusement as he tentatively touches the face on his stomach and sticks his new tongue out.

You now circle back around to the man who now has his face on his butt. You see that he has now pulled his pants down and is mooning everyone, albeit with only one cheek. His face is now exposed and he is trying to waddle away backwards so that he can see.

"ha-ha," you laugh out loud as you revel in the power that you have.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Continue messing with the cheerleaders

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
"Hey, she is laughing," a man yells at you and points. "I think she might be causing this."

That grabs the attention of quite a few other people. The most common reaction to this is to run away, however a few have the opposite reaction and charge toward you. They are all men that come after you. There are about four of them. They hop over the rail and onto the field. They are running right toward you. You look up at the small crowd that is now running specifically from you.

You pick out several women in the crowd. You swap each and every one of those men into one of the women running away. The women are confused at first that they are on the field. Then they are afraid as they realize what has happened and scream with their new masculine voices. You see that the men, now women, stopped running away and turned to look at you. You flip them off with both of your perfectly manicured hands. Their mouths drop as they realize that they were right and you are to blame.

You are reluctant to leave your centaur body but decide that it is best. For one, some people now know that you are causing havoc from this location. Another reason is that your second back is really aching now from being hunched over for so long. You decide that you aren't done with the 'men' that tried to stop you. You swap your mind into the youngest and prettiest of the female bodies that you stuck them into, leaving him in the centaur cheerleader.

You focus on the other three. You pick one of them. He is in the body of a middle aged woman who is slightly heavyset. You swap his eyes with his big toes. His meaty female hands reach up to cover his eyes and to touch the toe now protruding from his eye sockets. He sits down and starts taking his shoes off.

The other two look at him and start running now. You swap one of their legs and hips away for the entire body of the other from the hips up. Now they are conjoined at the waist with each other and there are two female legs stuck together as well.

You step over those two and say, "Next time you won't mess with me!" They look up at you in shock and fear. You step over them and start running away with the crowd.

There is a teenage couple that are running away together holding hands. You swap their heads around. They immediately let go and turn to look at each other and scream, almost comically.

You debate what you want to do now
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Someone sees you

1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
"Oh, I am just getting started," you say as you look around for more people to swap.

As you are looking you feel the people behind you pushing. The presence of more swaps is causing a lot of panic. You are pressed to the ground and your face hits the stairs. You painfully get up with blood streaming from your face.

"Outta my way," a man yells at you as he tries to climb over you. You can barely see through the blood on your face. You simply swap bodies with him leaving him to deal with the broken nose and face that he just caused you.

"Much better," you exclaim as you can now see clearly once again. You turn around and look at him in the eye. He is cursing and yelling from his new position on the ground. "You picked the wrong person to mess with," you say as you look him in the eye. He looks right back as much as he can through the blood and tears.

You swap his arms onto your body by giving him just a tiny bit of flesh under your arms. You now have four arms, two of them female. "My arms," he yells. You then take his legs in much the same way. You find this to be a bit awkward since they are jutting out of the side of your hips. Apparently our clothing got forced out of the way since your clothes have holes torn in them to accommodate the extra limbs.

You now are a regular looking tall man, but with a pair of dainty female arms poking out of your shirt below your normal ones, and female legs jutting out to the side coming from your hips. You thought it would be cool but find the extra limbs a bit awkward. Instead of fixing them, you decide to jump into another body. There is a small boy in front of you. You switch into him hoping that nobody would suspect a child.

From your lower stature you are almost trampled down a few times. It is only by getting off of the stairway and onto some seats on the side that you avoid a similar fate as last time. The crowd in thronging toward the exit just above. You swap a woman's head onto the hand of the man behind her. You then swap his head onto the hand of the woman behind him. You continue in this manor every time the crowd moves past you giving you the next victim. It isn't original but it gets a lot of people.

You notice that there are very few people left in the stadium now. Most of the people who are left have been incapacitated by you in some way. The rest are rushing out in a hurry. There isn't much left here to do.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Keep going

choices: One of Nichole's friends comes by
Spend the night outside as Cheyenne
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.content:
"That was awesome," you say to yourself. You feel elated by the power of what you have just done. A big part of you wants to keep going, even if that means finding a new location. However, you decide that that was a good run and that you should get back to your current base of operations.

You step over the recently incapacitated people with heads on their hands who haven't yet figured out how to move. You climb to the top of the stairs and look in front of you. There are still some crowds here. You don't want to push through them to get out so you pick a person that is some distance off and swap into him. You then look ahead through the crowd and find another person who is where you want to be, you swap through about a dozen people this way as you 'push' your way through the crowd.

Finally you arrive in the parking lot. You are currently in the body of a teenage girl. You have no idea if she is here with anyone or not but you don't want to find out. You frantically look around for a bird that you can swap into. You have decided that birds are the best way to travel. You are dismayed however that you can't find one. The parking lot is still a mess with cars jammed up and honking their horns as they try to flee. You see more than a few accidents but people don't want to stop to deal with it so they just keep going.

You continue walking as you look for a bird. It is just to noisy and crowded here to find any. You just continue walking and looking for your ticket out as you ignore most everyone. Finally you make it away from the main parking lot and are walking down the sidewalk. You just aren't having any luck. Finally, you look up at the power lines and see one perching above.

You swap your mind into the bird. You quickly adjust to the new sensations and body. Soon you are comfortable enough to fly. You look down and see the girl wandering around. She wanders into the street where she is nearly run over but the driver stops, just barely. You feel a little bit afraid as you see just how far down the drop is. While you have become accustomed to letting the bird's body do the flying, having the courage to jump off of a perch while this high up is still difficult. You force yourself to trust your bird body to do what it knows how to do and take off.

The thrill of flying is almost enough to match the thrill of unleashing your power, almost. You enjoy every second of the flight back to your new house. You manged to find it easily owning to your meticulous attention as you left. Soon you are back at the bird feeder looking over at the last bird in Cheyenne's body. The dog is looking at you intently but isn't barking like dogs usually would. You figure it is the other bird's mind in there so it isn't behaving like a dog.

You swap back into the dog. Then you realize the flaw in your plan. You are tied up. You don't have any hands wherewith to untie yourself. Nichole and Danielle can't come get you, even if they wanted to, since they are scrambled inside the house. You decide to swap back into the bird but are dismayed to see that it has flown away. There currently aren't any birds there right now. You are stuck.
1113221211121111222211221111111121111221.title: Go back 'home'

choices: Pack some stuff and leave now.
1113221211121111222211221111111121112.content:
You allow the male officers to cuff you they begin reading you your rights.

You let your power do its thing, and come up with your most exotic swap yet. You swap the brains

of your Mother and Mark with your mom's mammary glands, then swapped the brains of the two

officers into your mother's ass.

The bodies of your Mom, Mark, and the two officers slump over, and Jessica falls to the floor as

she fights with her four other brains for control of her body.

You turn around to see Amanda staring at everyone around you. She is in her pajamas and looks all ready for bed.

"Thank you for changing," you say as you swap into Amanda's body, and then swap her into the turtle. brain with the turtle's.

You take the guns and ammo from the Officer's belts as you plan your next move.

What should you do now? The police will come after you when the officers don't report back.
1113221211121111222211221111111121112.title: Unleash your power!

11132212111211112222112211111111211121.content:
Who knows who else may come after you? You need to leave now.

You go to Amanda's bedroom to change when you had another Idea; Can you swap memories?

You try to swap your name and date of birth with the Amanda brain.

You had no idea how to test it; You try to focus; Think Amanda! How do I test it?... only to realize that it worked!

Using the ability again, you swap her fashion and beauty knowledge with your football and basketball knowledge.

With that knowledge base you instantly choose to change into a pair of Jeans and a tee shirt, then apply a bit of makeup to look presentable and blend in, but not so much that you'd be drawing attention.

You pack your suitcase full of Andrew's-er Amanda's clothing, make-up and jewelry before looking through the house and find as much money as you can and stuffing it Into Andrew's Purse.

Returning to the lounge room you see that the 5 minds are still struggling for control over the one body.

"Everyone, I am leaving now," you say as you grab Andrew's car keys and head out the door.

You get in your body's car and start driving. You aren't sure where you are going, but you want to distance yourself from the name Andrew as much as possible.

You can be anyone you want. Mainly you want to be someone completely unrelated. You are extremely tempted to cause another incident like at the museum.

It was funny, but as much as you want to, it is late and there isn't that much that is open. For that matter, the late hour is going to make finding a new identity difficult.

There aren't a lot of people out. You also think about how to jump into a new body without whoever is stuck in Andrew's body telling anyone.

Sure, you could switch bodies and kill this body, but you feel like that is going a bit too far. Another thought that you have is that you could switch into an animal...

The animal won't be able to tell anyone anything. That idea is sounding better and better to you. That is also preferable since it doesn't draw any attention to you and won't have the police looking for a murderer.

Or you can simply pull over and sleep for the night, and make your choice in the morning.
Or you can just wait until morning, and make a desc
11132212111211112222112211111111211121.title: Pack some stuff and leave now.

111322121112111122221122111111112111211.content:
Yes," you say, "an animal."

You've made up your mind. Now how to proceed. There aren't a lot of people or animals out tonight. Everyone is in their beds. Another consideration is that you don't want to leave Amanda's body or car anywhere near your new identity. You don't want there to be any perceivable link. You look around. It is late at night but perhaps there are some animals nearby. You see several birds perched nearby.

"Perfect," you say to yourself. You will the swap to occur and soon you are in the most foreign body you have ever been in.

Your vision is incredible. You can focus in on every detail or zoom out all at once. You are completely incapacitated with sensory overload for a minute. You move your arms around. They feel strong, yet limited in their movement. You don't have fingers that you can wiggle anymore, at least not as much. You still seem to have those muscles, but when you try to wiggle your fingers, not much happens. It is more like your arm shifts and twists a little bit.

You look down and are shocked to see the crest of the bird that you just possessed where your chest should be. You reach out to the sides with your 'arms' and take a look. You see to wings spread out to each side of you. You are excited and afraid at the same time. You want to fly but aren't sure how.

You think about all of your experiences to date. Other than the people that have been so scrambled, nobody has been tripping over themselves. Whatever magic or power you have been given seems to compensate for varying body configurations. You wonder if those people that were so scrambled could move about, they just are paralyzed with the preconceived notion that they can't. Perhaps that is something to experiment with later, but for now it stands to reason that whatever allowed you to walk in Ashley's body all day without falling over, would allow you to function with a bird's body.

You are perched on a small picnic table next to Amanda's running car. You conclude that the drop isn't too bad so you are going to go for it. You walk up to the ledge. You find that if you think about it too much, you fall over your legs since they are so unlike any legs you've ever had before. You don't know how to move them. However, if you relax and let your bird body do the walking, you can manage. Your body seems to know how to do it.

You relax and get used to letting your body do the thinking about how to move instead of you actively overriding your bodies natural rhythms. With Ashley and the other humans you've been today, you know how to move. Walking as Ashley and walking as yourself are so similar, that you didn't think about it or actively fight your bodies natural ability to walk. In this case you have to actively not think about it.

Soon you get the hang of it. Walking around the table is as natural as walking would be in your old body, or Andrew-Amanda's, or Ashley's. Time to fly. You go to the edge and jump off. Your little bird heart is racing. Of course that is natural for a bird but you swear there is a bit of a rush as well. You let your body do its thing and take flight. In no time at all you are soaring above the ground.

Your eyesight is incredibly good. Even in the low light you can make out every detail below you. The colors seem a bit different to you. You reason that birds eyes are configured different and that this is how birds always see things. Soon you are completely caught up in flying. It is exhilarating. Nothing you have ever experienced before quite matches it. You fly around town for what feels like hours.

Soon you realize that you are incredibly hungry. Starving in fact. You feel almost weak. You look down at the ground. You are over a residential neighborhood right now.

"Oh man, I don't want to eat worms," you think to yourself. Soon you see a nice bird feeder in someones backyard. Almost without thinking, you swoop down and perch on the feeder. You are so hungry that you don't even think about what you are doing. The birdseed looks so good. You push your beak into the seed and start eating.

You frantically eat the seeds in the feeder. Your body knows how to crack the seeds open with your beak and eat the insides. In a frenzy of activity you are cracking seeds and gobbling them down. You soon feel thirsty. The also have a bird bath next to the bird feeder. You hesitate for only a moment before drinking the water there.

For quite some time you alternate between the two until your body feels satisfied. You still feel a bit weak but are feeling much better. You also feel tired. Not as much as you would have thought given that it was now the middle of the night, but tired. You find a nice branch in a nearby tree and perch there. Soon you are lightly sleeping like a bird sleeps. You are vaguely aware of your surroundings, enough that you know you are safe.

You get up several times to feed in the bird feeder and drink the water. You even go for a few night flights but come back here after each one. You don't want to get too far away from the abundance that can be found here. Soon, morning comes.
111322121112111122221122111111112111211.title: Take over a Bird.

111322121112111122221122111111112112.content:
You decide to wander around a bit and check up on your Mother and Jessica. You haven't seen them for a while. You walk into the kitchen and see Jessica coloring in a coloring book.

"Where is Mom?" you ask. She just shrugs and goes back to coloring. You decide that she isn't a problem so you start looking for your mother. You wander upstairs. Mack is wandering around with Mark's body now. You step over him. He barely notices you. You see a light in Amanda's room and you figure she is getting dressed. You continue on to your mother's room figuring that that is where she has gone. You see that her light is on and hear a bit of noise inside.

You don't even bother knocking and barge in. You see that she has the news on. They are doing a piece on the swapping at the museum. You see the pretty reporter with her head on her cameraman's body talking about the scene behind her. You quickly see that there is a tip-line phone number on the screen and that your mother is using Jessica's tiny fingers to dial her phone.

You quickly swap her hands for her kidneys. Now she just has meaty bulges at the end of each arm and her hands are safely insider her body where she can't possibly dial a phone. The phone falls to the ground. You rush over and pick it up. You see that she had nearly finished dialing the tip-line number. You caught her just in time.

She starts sobbing. "Please ... you can't do this to us," she stammers between sobs.

"I see I wasn't quite clear," you start. "Just what do you think would have happened?"

"I just need this to stop!" she cried again.

"Well, you aren't thinking," you say. "You see, Mark is currently mostly a turtle right now. If you had succeeded, you'd have condemned him to be a turtle for the rest of his life, do you understand?"

She just continues to cry, "Why are you doing this .... why?"

"Look, you'll just have to accept that I am doing it," you snap. "From now on, one of you will always be part animal. If you call the authorities, you'll be condemning one of your children to an incomplete life as a turtle or a snake. If you don't, I'll rotate them out and give them a turn as a person. Do you understand?"

She nods her head with tears streaming down her face. "Good!" you say, "I want you to impress the seriousness of this on Mark and Amanda." She nods her head yes and continues crying. You are satisfied for the moment that she won't be a problem again, at least not for a while. You leave her there without any usable hands for now.

You walk back into the hallway. Amanda is staring at you with your old face. You swap bodies with her, taking hers and giving her Ashley's. You decide that nobody will mess with you so you go to your room and crawl into bed. You have a hard time falling asleep. The events of the day swirl through your head. Finally, you drift off to sleep.
111322121112111122221122111111112112.title: Amanda returns

choices: Put them all to work on the house
1113221211121111222211221111111121122.content:
You wake up feeling rested and refreshed. You stretch and climb out of bed. The first thing your feel is that you need to go pee. You also feel a bit gross. "Amanda!" you yell for your sister. When she doesn't come running in you go to find her. She is in her bed still asleep. She has put on some of her own pajamas which are much too big for Ashley's body. You find it amusing to see your own face on top of a female body, fast asleep.

"Amanda!" you snap. She jumps up with a start. When she sees you she stops and stares at you with her eyes wide with fear.

"Yes sir?" she asks tentatively.

"Good!" you say. "Go pee now, then I'll give you your entire body. Shower, get dressed, eat breakfast, brush your teeth, and then we'll swap back." you say.

She gives you and excited look. She runs off to the bathroom with Ashley's body. In just a minute she hops out and eagerly awaits getting her own body back. You will the swap to occur and now you are back to the way you were last evening. You have your own head atop Ashley's body again.

"Nothing funny or you'll be a snake for a week," you warn her. She giggles with delight before running off to do the tasks you've given her. You decide that you'll go find out how Mark and your mother are doing. You go downstairs. Mark is still in Mack's cage. He couldn't exactly go anywhere.

"Good morning Mark," you say as you approach. "Did you have a good night?"

"No," he snaps back.

"Well, I am sorry to hear it," you say as you walk off. You were considering restoring him but decide to hold off until he is more pleasant. Nobody else is up yet, or if they are, they aren't here. You go into the kitchen. Ashley's stomach growls a bit. You decide to go ahead and eat a little something. The kitchen is torn up from Mack's scavenging. You find something small to eat, just so you don't have to deal with feeling hungry. After all, you don't want Ashley's hot little body gaining weight.

You wander upstairs to find your mother and Jessica. When you arrive, you see that Jessica is in her own bed with your mother's body. She is wearing some of your mother's pj's. Finally you walk into your mom's bedroom. You find her awake and struggling to get dressed in some of Jessica's clothes. She still has her kidney hands so she is trying to use her mouth.

You decide to fix up her hands on the spot. She apparently hadn't realized you were there until her hands were restored. She turns around to face you. You can see the anger in her eyes. She looks like she is about to have it out with you but wisely keeps her mouth shut. Finally she says, "I have to work today."

"Take a sick day," you say. Then you walk out. You see Amanda going from the bathroom into her bedroom with a towel wrapped around her head. You leave your mother to her business of getting dressed and you let Jessica sleep. You wander back downstairs and plop down on the couch. You start thinking about what you'll do. This is fun for now but you know it won't last. Bossing your family around will only entertain you for so long, then there are the practical matters as well. Your mother does have to go to work or you'll all run out of money. You push these thoughts out of your mind for now.

Soon your mother comes downstairs. She glares at you but again, doesn't say anything. She goes off to the kitchen and you continue vegging for a while longer. It doesn't take long before Amanda wanders down as well. She comes up to you to give you a report.

"I just thought I'd tell you," she starts. "I decided to go with Jeans and a tee shirt so you'd be comfortable." she says, seeming pleased with herself. "I put on a touch of makeup so that you'd look presentable and blend in, but not so much that you'd be drawing attention, or feel like a clown." she says as she turns her head to the side so that you can see her face. She demonstrates her makeup to you. You are a bit annoyed that she put it on, but have to admit that you are impressed that she was so thoughtful about it. "I just thought I'd give you a status update. Now I'm off for breakfast and to brush my, er your, teeth then I'll report back." She says.

You can tell that she is pleased with herself but isn't quite happy about the whole situation. You have to admit that she is turning out to be the best of your servants. Jessica doesn't complain too much but she isn't useful either. You can tell that Mark and your mother are both just waiting for an opportunity to turn on you. You ponder your situation a bit more but don't really form any sort of plan. You decide to just play things by ear.

You wander into the kitchen. Amanda is finishing up a bowl of oatmeal and an apple. Your mother, with Jessica's tiny body, is helping Jessica get something to eat. It almost looks like a small child helping a grown up with her breakfast. Only their proper heads spoil the illusion. Your mother is currently pushing a chair over to the counter to get some food down. Amanda finishes up and nods to you before going upstairs to brush her teeth. You sit down and watch with amusement. Your mother and Jessica eat their breakfast in silence. Finally Jessica speaks up, "Why are you being so mean?" she innocently asks.

"Because!" you gruffly snap back. She keeps prying so you leave to go find Amanda. You walk back upstairs to the bathroom to see Amanda brushing her teeth. "Almost done," she gurgles with a mouthful of toothpaste. She spits and rinses then takes a bit of mouthwash. She swishes it around. You are getting impatient. You won't admit this, but Jessica is the only one here who gets to you. Her innocent pleas are tugging at your conscience just a bit.

Finally Amanda is done. She turns to you and twirls around so you can see. "Did I do OK?" she asks a bit fearfully.

"Perfect!" you say. "In fact, I am impressed that you put so much thought into how I'd feel while in your body." You reply. She has a look of relief on her face. You then swap bodies with her, taking her entire body for yourself. When you arrive you are pleased that you feel clean and refreshed. She seems disappointed that she no longer has her own body now that she has your head and Ashley's body again. She doesn't say anything though. "Now, go get ready as best you can. You are going to be rewarded today." you say to her.
1113221211121111222211221111111121122.title: The next morning

choices: Later on, walk through town, not swapping anyone.
11132212111211112222112211112.content:
"Mom, I heard screaming outside so I went to check it out," you slip off the trench revealing Ashley's body. "and somehow I swapped bodies with a girl. Everyone else was swapping too." you feign a sad look. "Oh, honey." you mom says trying to consol you. She also gives you a hug. You enjoy feeling your breasts smooshed against hers. "Is there anything I can do for you?" she asks. You shake your head no. "I'm just gonna go to bed." you tell her.

A couple hours later, you have a strange dream. In it you are at the hotel you visited earlier. You had Ashley's body but wearing a tiny red bikini and black flip flops. "What the-" you are cut off by screaming. You run around the building, making noise with your flip flops and your jiggling breasts.

You finally visit a room full of swapped people and a figure with it's back to you. It turned around and faced you. You were shocked to see it looked like your normal self but was black like a silhouette. It spoke to you, with a voice that was a combination of yours and Ashley's. "Know who I am?" it asked. You gave no response. "I am the dark side of you that abuses the swap power and enjoys it. But for identification purposes, just call me Quicksilver." it sneered.

You were sickened by this thing so you attacked. Ashley's body was athletic, giving you enough speed and power to beat the shit out of your dark side. "You're finished Quicksilver. Now you'll disappear forever." you valiantly state. He lies on the ground, wheezing and coughs up blood. "Fine, Andrew, you win. I'll go away forever. But before I do, you'll never swap Ashley's body back. You'll keep it forever!" Quicksilver yells before exploding into a great white light, forcing you awake. "What a dream..." you say.

An hour later, you feel extremely guilty. All those poor people and civil protection workers were swapped unjustly. You gather enough mental strength and concentrate on your power. You imagine all the people and animals you messed up, and swap every single one back to normal. "There we go. I'll never abuse my powers unjusrly ever again." you say with a chuckle.

But then you notice you still have Ashley's body. "For some reason I don't want to swap me and Ashley back." you ponder. "I'm sorry Ashley, but I'm keeping your body." you say to no one in a sorry tone.
11132212111211112222112211112.title: Show her the 'accident'

choices: Find a new location to swap people.
